item.description:
Robert Desaulniers is the neuro-spa director at the Tree of Life Rejuvenation Center in Patagonia, AZ
He promises to take you on an exciting journey through your mind as we learn the art of "Setting Intentions" and you will learn what it takes to "deprogram" and "reprogram" your subconscious mind through "thriving" intentions.

 

 

Limited space available - pre-registration absolutely required!!

 

This is the first class of the 10-week course: Life Force Energy - the Hippocrates Approach to Optimum Health.

 

Class schedule:

6 - 6:30 PM: Arrival, registration, and eat your brown-bag dinner (in future classes, full dinner will be prepared and eaten together in class)

6:30 - 6:35 PM: Quick Zumba to relax and shake off excess stress

6:35 - 6:45 PM: Review plans for evening

6:45 - 7 PM: Eggless Egg Salad Wrap food demo (and eating!)

7 - 8 PM: Get acquainted with your classmates (each person shares five-minute bio, goals, and health journey)

8 - 8:01 PM: Very quick Zumba!

8:01 - 9 PM: Guest Speaker Robert Desaulniers

9 - 9:30 PM: Discussion of Chapter 1 of manual, Ann Wigmore's book "Why Suffer," and DVDs "Principles of Health" and "Eating" (given to pre-registered students)

 

Cost of one four-hour class: $50 (without any course materials)

Cost of entire 10-week course: $490 and $290 for an additional family member (includes two-hour free consult with trained counselor, 5th edition of a 425-page manual, 26 DVDs to watch at home, sprout-growing trays with seeds, and individual weekly peer support from a graduate)

*If you have to miss a class in the series, you can make it up in one of the future terms, given four times a year.

 

Cash or check only please - credit cards not accepted.
item.name: Creating Your Thriving Intentions with Robert Desaulniers of Tree of Life, AZ
